title: Move with overlap + deposit + broker fee
prompt: Create a financial scenario for someone moving apartments. Start in January 2024, run for 12 months. Starting cash: $20,000. Monthly takehome: $8,000, baseline expenses: $2,500. Old rent is $3,200 for January and February. New rent starts in February at $3,800 and continues. In February only: pay new apartment deposit of $3,800 and broker fee of $3,800.
